node.html: This project uses github API to extract github users data. Data is related to their bio, number of followers, number of followings, and 10 top rated repositories. It servers the purpose of instant lookup of user github profiles.
An awesome social networking website that allows you to make connections, post/view jobs, send mails and post and view statuses of your connections just like Linkedin.

Simple application of Computer Vision that allow user to put filters (mean, median, sharpening, blur, edge detection, emboss, smoothing) on the given image with option of customized filtering as well. Read more about Filtering here.
An amazing Computer Vision Project used to read text document of various extensions and extract characters to read and shows final result in Matlab GUI.
A small search engine which provides ranks for given queries using TFIDF, IDF, Jelinek Mercer and Okapi BM25 scoring functions.
This project allow you to have an instant look up at popular news of given list areas by interactive Map based GUI.
Batttleship game built in Unity as a part of my semester project. See Project here
Chess Engine that allows to play chess between a human player and computer bot. I developed a mechanism using various heuristics to detect the optimal moves using AI approaches.

This projects displays the climate information of US states and their regions with live cameras functionality to have a quick view of area. I built this as a part of Harvard CS50 EDX course. See Project here
Online Machine Learning Course on Coursera. This project contains all my assignments and their solutions. See assignments at my github link
My first online course at Coursera HarvardX- CS50 Introduction To Computer Science See all the problem sets with solved solutions at my github link.
Sentiment analysis project used to categorize the posted tweet content either as negative, positive or neutral and shows analysis using beautiful plotting library plotly.
